name: Fetish Locator
description:
Fetish Locator is a visual novel about a student who will find an app that will change his life forever. It makes people do things they would never do in their daily life. Those things are classified by fetishes, there are some common and light and there are the big ones, which are a little bit harder to achieve. Some of the big ones will give you a lot of points that you can use to advance in the story. Your goal is to be the one with more points in the whole game and have experienced all fetishes

DISCLAIMER:

Fetish Locator is intended for mature adults 18 years or older. Please abide by your local laws.

All characters are 18 years or older. No exceptions.

The characters in Fetish Locator explore relationships and sexuality in both healthy and unhealthy ways. Some of these players may find objectionable. To that end, much of the content is optional, and often there are alternative paths available. This is necessary for the story. The content explored should not be treated as an endorsement of particular fetishes, kinks, or patterns of behavior. Please explore your own relationships and sexuality responsibly.
